## Source: kam193 (8023a44d657b04f09628c938fa7fb4fbd8c1300f630aff31837b32f2337ce65f)
The package starts a Discord bot that waits for messages and automatically executes any file sent as an attachment, effectively turning the package into a RAT.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.


Campaign: 2025-10-d1snakegame


Reasons (based on the campaign):


 - Downloads and executes a remote malicious script.
